channel.title: Help with Jail
channel.description: I'm having trouble making a jail.. so could anyone post their code for a jail?

item.description:

they only can help.
BTW ILOVEJAVA
YOU FAIL![/quote]
hey, FUCK YOU. Give me one good reason why i fail? stupid ass dick sucker. If you don’t have anything nice to say, gtfo. We are helping, not spoon feeding. dumb fuck. he obviously does not know how to write the code, therefore i showed him. i don’t care if i am “spoon feeding”, it’s better than your dumb bitch ass comming around here and instead of helping people, you post non-sense. don’t bother reading the posts and topics if you are not helping. stupid ass fagget. get a fucking life. idiot.
[/quote]

First of all I’M NOT GAY and I will NOT fuck you. I don’t care if you are!
second stupid ass dick sucker your calling me a a person with a dumb ass who sucks dick… and how would you know I suck dicks?
I don’t have anything nice to say you should reread this whole post… =D
you not being cool by saying all that shit you want to be the truth
I’m not being nice… ooh i said you fail thats a burn…? would you like some ice with that?
Say I post nonsense look at your post
and last time I checked my post it said I would help.

P.S. make sense… and make sure you have something to back your ass up.

item.title: Help with Jail
item.dc:creator: @lary370 lary370
item.description:
@lary370 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:4, topic:334149”][quote author=Defiance link=topic=430535.msg3161171#msg3161171 date=1269557043]
Nobody is going to do that for you. You need to look for a tutorial or make your own.
[/quote][quote author=lary370 link=topic=430535.msg3161183#msg3161183 date=1269557587]
I can help you ,but not make you one…
[/quote]
I think you guys deserve fuck up of the day.

Mod I got ya covered.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }[/code][/quote]

Last time I looked at the rules people here are not here to spoon feed other.
they only can help.
BTW ILOVEJAVA
YOU FAIL!

item.title: Help with Jail
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

if Mr. Despair’s code does not work, try this one:

if (cmd[0].equals("jail")) {
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just Jailed " + p2.username);
p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have just been Jailed by " + p.username);
p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "All your runes and teleport tabs were deleted to prevent teleporting out.");
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 554, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 555, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 556, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 557, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 558, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 559, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 560, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 561, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 562, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 563, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 564, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 565, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 566, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 9075, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 8007, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 8008, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 8009, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 8010, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 8011, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 8013, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p2, 8012, 999999);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 9003, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 600, 1);
p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 192);
p2.jailed = 1;
p2.setCoords(3228, 3407, 0);
}
}

this one deletes all runes so they cannot tele, and also deletes teletabs if your server has them.

Read full topic
